title: The Company of officer cadets
creator_credit: Phillip Mark-Law, Artransa Park Studios and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A career as an Army Officer is one which might not normally occur to a young man choosing his future profession. The busy life of young men at one of Australia’s officer-training schools where, behind the parades, formal social functions and tradition, there is difficult and demanding study to train men for battle and for times of national disaster.
